title: OP Stack does not work with Nethermind as the L1
body:
**Description**

When running an Optimism node with op-node and op-geth, and using Nethermind as the Ethereum L1 node, sync fails. op-node will print `t=2023-11-25T09:31:07+0000 lvl=warn msg="Derivation process temporary error"     attempts=33928 err="temp: failed to fetch receipts of L1 block 0x4c2aeea203fb22ce484cf1ff531aa8bab21722c3dea65b398488061dbafcd7fd:8335466 (parent: 0xc8df9361b793a142a5b67c34398f87109c88666adb068389d2bbd7015466812b:8335465) for L1 sysCfg update: receipt 4 has unexpected tx index 0"` after a while.

**Steps to Reproduce**

Run a Nethermind, using either defaults for TxLookupLimit and Barriers, or `--Receipt.TxLookupLimit=0 --Sync.AncientBodiesBarrier=0 --Sync.AncientReceiptsBarrier=0`

Set up an Optimism Goerli or Mainnet stack, e.g. with https://github.com/CryptoManufaktur-io/optimism-docker. Configure it to use the Nethermind RPC for its L1.

Let it sync, and eventually the error will show.

The exact same setup using Geth as the L1 RPC works.

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - Version: `1.21.1+9b435ba0` and `1.22.0+ae444a4b`, tested on both
 - Consensus Client: Lighthouse 4.5.0

**Logs**

op-node, see the "failed to fetch receipts"

```
ptimism-docker-op-node-1  | t=2023-11-25T09:38:47+0000 lvl=info msg="connected to peer"                      peer=16Uiu2HAmNjTLavdS8tW5baQUdmvmmiubaTuZL22DwWpjVwk8DTza addr=/ip4/3.219.100.27/tcp/19994
optimism-docker-op-node-1  | t=2023-11-25T09:38:47+0000 lvl=info msg="Starting P2P sync client event loop"    peer=16Uiu2HAmNjTLavdS8tW5baQUdmvmmiubaTuZL22DwWpjVwk8DTza
optimism-docker-op-node-1  | t=2023-11-25T09:38:48+0000 lvl=info msg="Received signed execution payload from p2p" id=0xb16c232227212b22f19a65eca76e6fec85f96cd71af6435ba590089e7cd19fed:17738530 peer=16Uiu2HAkyaAp7nNHg5ZwFgiM6YsWCqyKYQuCz5KmpsziY1V8Sk9N
optimism-docker-op-node-1  | t=2023-11-25T09:38:48+0000 lvl=info msg="Optimistically queueing unsafe L2 execution payload" id=0xb16c232227212b22f19a65eca76e6fec85f96cd71af6435ba590089e7cd19fed:17738530
optimism-docker-op-node-1  | t=2023-11-25T09:38:49+0000 lvl=warn msg="Derivation process temporary error"     attempts=33972 err="temp: failed to fetch receipts of L1 block 0x4c2aeea203fb22ce484cf1ff531aa8bab21722c3dea65b398488061dbafcd7fd:8335466 (parent: 0xc8df9361b793a142a5b67c34398f87109c88666adb068389d2bbd7015466812b:8335465) for L1 sysCfg update: receipt 4 has unexpected tx index 0"
optimism-docker-op-node-1  | t=2023-11-25T09:38:50+0000 lvl=info msg="Received signed execution payload from p2p" id=0x8944f069771898ab561aba0697770b73f3dc2dd9630f2c5151307b20f5c5acd0:17738531 peer=16Uiu2HAmBJAzmNegfG5g99QxeqyzujRtev98SiwZJDgYTrGtjQEd
optimism-docker-op-node-1  | t=2023-11-25T09:38:50+0000 lvl=info msg="Optimistically queueing unsafe L2 execution payload" id=0x8944f069771898ab561aba0697770b73f3dc2dd9630f2c5151307b20f5c5acd0:17738531
optimism-docker-op-node-1  | t=2023-11-25T09:38:52+0000 lvl=info msg="Received signed execution payload from p2p" id=0xb4e26fbe3af953ee1ee1fb389d7e1c5087f8afafcdd51d63d2e3da367355fff5:17738532 peer=16Uiu2HAkyaAp7nNHg5ZwFgiM6YsWCqyKYQuCz5KmpsziY1V8Sk9N
optimism-docker-op-node-1  | t=2023-11-25T09:38:52+0000 lvl=info msg="Optimistically queueing unsafe L2 execution payload" id=0xb4e26fbe3af953ee1ee1fb389d7e1c5087f8afafcdd51d63d2e3da367355fff5:17738532
optimism-docker-op-node-1  | t=2023-11-25T09:38:54+0000 lvl=info msg="connected to peer"                      peer=16Uiu2HAmQDrPvqZqDYyc6Vgwa7vfdupDGFtX9T8EjgcFhst8Z1JP addr=/ip4/3.231.68.59/tcp/16544
optimism-docker-op-node-1  | t=2023-11-25T09:38:54+0000 lvl=info msg="Starting P2P sync client event loop"    peer=16Uiu2HAmQDrPvqZqDYyc6Vgwa7vfdupDGFtX9T8EjgcFhst8Z1JP
optimism-docker-op-node-1  | t=2023-11-25T09:38:54+0000 lvl=info msg="Received signed execution payload from p2p" id=0x85958f5166751df7d985bd30034fe6569213e4de31ba76c1a2f2c7b6651fecc2:17738533 peer=16Uiu2HAmBJAzmNegfG5g99QxeqyzujRtev98SiwZJDgYTrGtjQEd
optimism-docker-op-node-1  | t=2023-11-25T09:38:54+0000 lvl=info msg="Optimistically queueing unsafe L2 execution payload" id=0x85958f5166751df7d985bd30034fe6569213e4de31ba76c1a2f2c7b6651fecc2:17738533
```

Nethermind debug logs attached, see the same 09:38 timestamp. All times UTC.

[nethermind-debug.logs.gz](https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/files/13463549/nethermind-debug.logs.gz)
